mapper.select: SELECT dm.devices_manage_id AS device_manage_id, dm.manage_code, dm.model_name, po.process_code, section.name AS section_name, dt.name AS device_name FROM devices_manage dm LEFT JOIN position po ON dm.position_id = po.position_id LEFT JOIN section ON section.section_id = dm.section_id LEFT JOIN devices_type dt ON dm.devices_type_id = dt.devices_type_id WHERE dt.specialized = 5 ORDER BY dm.manage_code ASC
mapper.update: update drying_oven_device set setting_temperature = #{setting_temperature},slot = #{slot} where device_manage_id = #{device_manage_id}
